<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.85</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current value set to the controller (see [[setCustomSoundController]])</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getCustomSoundController''' [vehicle, controller]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - must be a transport type vehicle (doesn't work on characters or buildings)</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> controller: [[String]] - name of custom sound controller. Need to be full string like i.e. "CustomSoundController1". Currently you can pick from "CustomSoundController1" to "CustomSoundController32"</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[getCustomSoundController]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vehicle]] [[player]], "CustomSoundController1"];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3 Sound]], [[setCustomSoundController]], [[getCustomSoundControllerCount]], [[getSoundController]], [[getSoundControllerResult]], [[getAllSoundControllers]], [[getEnvSoundController]], [[getAllEnvSoundControllers]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part></template>
